column4: hi all, I have two drives in my system. one has the OS on it,the other is also formatted and partitioned, I want to reformat it with only one partition, how do i do that?
is there any graphical utility for Ubuntu that lets you view drives and partitions and lets you format drives?
can i do an apt-get on gparted?
gparted is handy with gnome, qtparted is handy with kde/kubuntu
